thread.title: BRIEF-Fannie Mae Announces Sixth Sale Of Reperforming Loans

title: BRIEF-Fannie Mae Announces Sixth Sale Of Reperforming Loans
text: March 13, 2018 / 3:13 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Fannie Mae Announces Sixth Sale Of Reperforming Loans Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Federal National Mortgage Association : * FANNIE MAE ANNOUNCES SIXTH SALE OF REPERFORMING LOANS * FANNIE MAE - SALE CONSISTS OF APPROXIMATELY 9,400 LOANS, HAVING AN UNPAID PRINCIPAL BALANCE OF APPROXIMATELY $1.97 BILLION * FANNIE MAE - BIDS ARE DUE ON APRIL 4, 2018 * FANNIE MAE - THE SALE OF REPERFORMING LOANS IS BEING MARKETED IN COLLABORATION WITH CITIGROUP GLOBAL MARKETS, INC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
